mapper.select: select count (bbs.b_id) as boardId from bbs_board bbs left join board_files bf on bbs.b_id = bf.b_id

select * from ( select row_number() over(order by bbs.b_id desc, bbs.b_count desc, bbs.b_title asc ) as rn, bbs.b_id as boardId, bbs.b_title as boardTitle, bbs.b_contents as boardContents, bbs.b_author as boardAuthor, bbs.b_count as readCount, bbs.reg_date, bbs.mod_date, coalesce(bf.origin_filename, '') as originFileName, coalesce(bf.stored_filename, '') as storedFileName, coalesce(bf.file_path, '') as filePath
from bbs_board bbs left join board_files bf on bbs.b_id = bf.b_id )a where 1 = 1 and rn between #{startRow} and #{rangeCnt}
